description:
Try TapNote for free with TapNote Lite! Features Dropbox sync, multiple cards, emailing or printing documents, manual cursor movement, and a custom design for both phones and TouchPad.

If you like TapNote Lite, purchase TapNote to unlock all features and support future development! Full version includes Just Type support, Quick Text date insertion, fast scrolling, word count stats, multiple themes and fonts, and no nag banners!

No access to the paid App Catalog? Enjoy TapNote Lite indefinitely and nag-free. I hope you will consider buying TapNote if/when the paid App Catalog makes it to your region!

Currently available in English.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK:
Email me at tapnote@onecrayon.com for ridiculously good support.

WHAT'S NEW in 1.3:
* Updated Dropbox API to allow app to continue working after Dec. 1
* New "Disconnect From Dropbox" option for easier debugging
